description.value:
This thick orange cream quickly seeps into skin. In addition to causing painful swelling in the brain, liar's demise compels the victim to speak only the truth. While under the effect of liar's demise, you take the listed poison damage and mental damage for any time you voluntarily and knowingly tell a lie, due to the poison's increased blood pressure to your brain. You take this damage once per round, even if you lie several times in rapid succession. You're aware of this effect and can choose to not answer or give only evasive, technically truthful, answers; this is a mental effect.

Activate 1 Interact

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}, @Damage[3d6[poison],3d6[mental]]{3d6 poison damage and 3d6 mental damage} for lying (1 minute)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}, @Damage[4d6[poison],4d6[mental]]{4d6 poison damage and 4d6 mental damage} for lying (1 minute)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3}, @Damage[5d6[poison],5d6[mental]|traits:death]{5d6 poison damage and 5d6 mental damage} for lying, and the damage becomes a death effect. If it reduces you to 0 Hit Points, your head explodes and you die. (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of zone of truth.
